CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide Navigation Bar
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: On: Do not display navigation bar (e.g. home & back icons)
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Off: Display navigation bar (e.g. home & back icons)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Zero-conf Server Discovery
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Off: Disable JMRI and Data Server Zero-conf Discovery
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: On: Enable JMRI and Data Server Zero-conf Discovery (default)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Zero-conf over IPv6
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Off: Disable Zero-conf Discovery over IPv6 (default)
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: On: Enable Zero-conf Discovery over IPv6
